Package it.polimi.ingsw.client

Interface View

All Known Implementing Classes:
CLIView, ViewGUIController
public interface View
Interface that defines the methods used by both the CLI view and the GUI view

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void anotherBuild​(int rowWorker, int columnWorker, int indexWorker, boolean isWrongBox, boolean isFirstTime, boolean isSpecialTurn, int clientIndex, int currentPlaying, boolean done)
    Method called from the VisitorClient when the ClientHandler receives an AskBuildEVent message and firstTime is false.
    void anotherMove​(int row, int column, int indexWorker, boolean isWrongBox, boolean firstTime, int clientIndex, int currentPlaying, boolean done)
    Method called from the VisitorClient when the ClientHandler receives an AskMoveEVent message and firstTime is false.
    void areYouSure​(int row1, int column1, int row2, int column2, int indexWorker, int currentPlaying, int clientIndex)
    Method called from the VisitorClient when the ClientHandler receives not for the first time an AskWorkerToMoveEvent message.
    void askBuildBeforeMove​(int indexWorker, int rowWorker, int columnWorker)
    Method called from the VisitorClient when the ClientHandler receives an AskBeforeBuildMove message.
    void askCard​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> cards)
    Method called from the VisitorClient when the ClientHandler receives an AskCard message.
    void askNCard​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> cards)
    Method called from the VisitorClient when the ClientHandler receives an Ask3Card message.
    void askNPlayer()
    Method called from the VisitorClient of the first player connected when the ClientHandler receives an AskNPlayer message.
    void askPlayer​(int clientIndex, boolean firstTime)
    Method called from the VisitorClient when the ClientHandler receives an AskPlayer message.
    void askWantToPlay​(AskWantToPlayEvent askWantToPlay)
    Method called from the VisitorClient when the clientHandler received an AskWantToPlay message
    void askWorker​(int row1, int column1, int row2, int column2, int currentPlaying, int clientIndex, boolean firstTime)
    Method called from the VisitorClient when the ClientHandler receives for the first time an AskWorkerToMoveEvent message.
    void buildMove​(int rowWorker, int columnWorker, int indexWorker, boolean isWrongBox, boolean isFirstTime, boolean isSpecialTurn, int clientIndex, int currentPlaying, boolean done)
    Method called from the VisitorClient when the ClientHandler receives an AskBuildEVent message and firstTime is true.
    void close()
    Method used to close client when server is not responding
    void closingConnectionEvent​(int indexClient, boolean GameNotAvailable)
    Method used to send to the server the request of closing the connection
    void initializeWorker()
    Method called from the VisitorClient when the ClientHandler receives an AskInitializeWorker message.
    void isNotMyTurn​(int clientIndex)
    This method is used when is not the player's turn
    void loserEvent​(int indexClient, java.util.ArrayList<User> userArray, boolean someoneWon)
    This method is used to show to the user who lost the end of the game
    void moveWorker​(int row, int column, int indexWorker, boolean isWrongBox, boolean firstTime, int clientIndex, int currentPlaying)
    Method called from the VisitorClient when the ClientHandler receives an AskMoveEVent message.
    void otherWorkerToMove​(int row1, int column1, int row2, int column2, int indexWorker, int currentPlaying, int clientIndex)
    Method called from the VisitorClient when the ClientHandler receives the message to move the other worker
    void printHeartBeat​(ObjHeartBeat objHeartBeat)
    Method used to send, using the SendMessageToServer object, a Pong message to the server after received a ping
    void printPossibleBlocks​(int row, int column)
    This method it's used to print the possible block to build in the chosen position
    void setIndexPlayer​(int indexPlayer)
    Method used to set the personal index of the player to know if the player can play or must wait his turn and then send an AckPlayer message to reply to the ObjState message
    void setNPlayer​(int nPlayer)
    Method used to set the number of the gamers playing and then send an AckStartGame message to answer to the startGameEvent message
    void setSendMessageToServer​(SendMessageToServer sendMessageToServer)
    Setter method for the SendMessageToServer object
    void someoneWon​(int indexClient)
    This method is used to show to the user that an opponent has won
    void updateBoard​(java.util.ArrayList<User> usersArray, Board board, boolean isShowReachable, int currentPlaying, int indexClient, boolean someoneDead)
    Method called from the VisitorClient every time the clientHandler received an updateBoard message
    void whoHasLost​(java.util.ArrayList<User> users, Board board, boolean setReachable, int currentPlaying, int indexClient)
    This method is used to show to the user that an opponent has lost
    void winnerEvent​(int indexClient)
    This method is used to show to the user who win the end of the game
    void youCanPlay()
    Method called from the VisitorClient when the clientHandler received an YouCanPlay message
    void youHaveToWait()
    Method called from the VisitorClient when the clientHandler received an YouHaveToWait message

  • Method Details

    • askWantToPlay

      void askWantToPlay​(AskWantToPlayEvent askWantToPlay)
      Method called from the VisitorClient when the clientHandler received an AskWantToPlay message
      Parameters:
      askWantToPlay - is the message send from the server to ask to the player if he wants to play

    • youCanPlay

      void youCanPlay()
      Method called from the VisitorClient when the clientHandler received an YouCanPlay message

    • youHaveToWait

      void youHaveToWait()
      Method called from the VisitorClient when the clientHandler received an YouHaveToWait message

    • setSendMessageToServer

      void setSendMessageToServer​(SendMessageToServer sendMessageToServer)
      Setter method for the SendMessageToServer object
      Parameters:
      sendMessageToServer - is the object to set

    • updateBoard

      void updateBoard​(java.util.ArrayList<User> usersArray, Board board, boolean isShowReachable, int currentPlaying, int indexClient, boolean someoneDead)
      Method called from the VisitorClient every time the clientHandler received an updateBoard message
      Parameters:
      usersArray - is the ArrayList of users taking part to the game
      board - is the object Board describe the game field
      isShowReachable - is a boolean that indicates if the printed board has to show the reachable boxes
      currentPlaying - is the integer index of the gamer playing in this turn
      indexClient - is the index of the client associated with the player
      someoneDead - true if one of the three players died

    • askNPlayer

      void askNPlayer()
      Method called from the VisitorClient of the first player connected when the ClientHandler receives an AskNPlayer message.

    • setNPlayer

      void setNPlayer​(int nPlayer)
      Method used to set the number of the gamers playing and then send an AckStartGame message to answer to the startGameEvent message
      Parameters:
      nPlayer - is the number of the gamers playing

    • askPlayer

      void askPlayer​(int clientIndex, boolean firstTime)
      Method called from the VisitorClient when the ClientHandler receives an AskPlayer message.
      Parameters:
      clientIndex - is the index of the client associated with the player
      firstTime - false if there is another player with the same name

    • setIndexPlayer

      void setIndexPlayer​(int indexPlayer)
      Method used to set the personal index of the player to know if the player can play or must wait his turn and then send an AckPlayer message to reply to the ObjState message
      Parameters:
      indexPlayer - is the index of the player

    • askNCard

      void askNCard​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> cards)
      Method called from the VisitorClient when the ClientHandler receives an Ask3Card message.
      Parameters:
      cards - is the ArrayList of cards name from which the user can choose

    • askCard

      void askCard​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> cards)
      Method called from the VisitorClient when the ClientHandler receives an AskCard message.
      Parameters:
      cards - is the ArrayList of the cards name from which the user can choose

    • initializeWorker

      void initializeWorker()
      Method called from the VisitorClient when the ClientHandler receives an AskInitializeWorker message.

    • askWorker

      void askWorker​(int row1, int column1, int row2, int column2, int currentPlaying, int clientIndex, boolean firstTime)
      Method called from the VisitorClient when the ClientHandler receives for the first time an AskWorkerToMoveEvent message.
      Parameters:
      row1 - is the row of the box occupied by the worker 1
      column1 - is the column of the box occupied by the worker 1
      row2 - is the row of the box occupied by the worker 2
      column2 - is the column of the box occupied by the worker 2
      currentPlaying - is the integer index of the player who is playing
      clientIndex - is the integer index associated to the client
      firstTime - indicates if it's the first time the player chooses a worker in the actual turn

    • areYouSure

      void areYouSure​(int row1, int column1, int row2, int column2, int indexWorker, int currentPlaying, int clientIndex)
      Method called from the VisitorClient when the ClientHandler receives not for the first time an AskWorkerToMoveEvent message.
      Parameters:
      row1 - is the row of the box occupied by the worker 1
      column1 - is the column of the box occupied by the worker 1
      row2 - is the row of the box occupied by the worker 2
      column2 - is the column of the box occupied by the worker 2
      indexWorker - is the integer index of the worker the player wants to move
      currentPlaying - is the integer index of the player who is playing
      clientIndex - is the integer index associated to the client

    • otherWorkerToMove

      void otherWorkerToMove​(int row1, int column1, int row2, int column2, int indexWorker, int currentPlaying, int clientIndex)
      Method called from the VisitorClient when the ClientHandler receives the message to move the other worker
      Parameters:
      row1 - is the row of the box occupied by the worker 1
      column1 - is the column of the box occupied by the worker 1
      row2 - is the row of the box occupied by the worker 2
      column2 - is the column of the box occupied by the worker 2
      indexWorker - is the integer index of the worker the player wants to move
      currentPlaying - is the integer index of the player who is playing
      clientIndex - is the integer index associated to the client

    • askBuildBeforeMove

      void askBuildBeforeMove​(int indexWorker, int rowWorker, int columnWorker)
      Method called from the VisitorClient when the ClientHandler receives an AskBeforeBuildMove message.
      Parameters:
      indexWorker - is the integer index of the worker the player wants to move
      rowWorker - is the row of the box occupied by the worker
      columnWorker - is the column of the box occupied by the worker

    • moveWorker

      void moveWorker​(int row, int column, int indexWorker, boolean isWrongBox, boolean firstTime, int clientIndex, int currentPlaying)
      Method called from the VisitorClient when the ClientHandler receives an AskMoveEVent message.
      Parameters:
      row - is the starting row of the worker to move
      column - is the starting column of the worker to move
      indexWorker - is the integer index of the worker the player chose to move
      isWrongBox - is a boolean that indicates if the move is wrong
      clientIndex - is the integer index associated to the client
      currentPlaying - is the integer index of the player who is playing
      firstTime - is a boolean that indicates if this is the first move tried in this turn

    • anotherMove

      void anotherMove​(int row, int column, int indexWorker, boolean isWrongBox, boolean firstTime, int clientIndex, int currentPlaying, boolean done)
      Method called from the VisitorClient when the ClientHandler receives an AskMoveEVent message and firstTime is false.
      Parameters:
      row - is the row of the box occupied by the worker
      column - is the column of the box occupied by the worker
      indexWorker - is the integer index of the worker the player wants to move
      isWrongBox - is a boolean that indicates if the move is wrong
      firstTime - is a boolean that indicates if this is the first move tried in this turn
      clientIndex - is the integer index associated to the client
      currentPlaying - is the integer index of the player who is playing
      done - is a boolean used to indicates if the move turn is over

    • printPossibleBlocks

      void printPossibleBlocks​(int row, int column)
      This method it's used to print the possible block to build in the chosen position
      Parameters:
      row - is the integer of the row of the Box where the player wants to build
      column - is the integer of the column of the Box where the player wants to build

    • buildMove

      void buildMove​(int rowWorker, int columnWorker, int indexWorker, boolean isWrongBox, boolean isFirstTime, boolean isSpecialTurn, int clientIndex, int currentPlaying, boolean done)
      Method called from the VisitorClient when the ClientHandler receives an AskBuildEVent message and firstTime is true.
      Parameters:
      rowWorker - is the row of the box occupied by the worker
      columnWorker - is the column of the box occupied by the worker
      indexWorker - is the integer index of the worker the player wants to move
      isWrongBox - is a boolean that indicates if the move is wrong
      isFirstTime - is a boolean that indicates if this is the first move tried in this turn
      isSpecialTurn - is a boolean used to identify special moves
      clientIndex - is the integer index associated to the client
      currentPlaying - is the integer index of the player who is playing
      done - is a boolean used to indicates if the move turn is over

    • anotherBuild

      void anotherBuild​(int rowWorker, int columnWorker, int indexWorker, boolean isWrongBox, boolean isFirstTime, boolean isSpecialTurn, int clientIndex, int currentPlaying, boolean done)
      Method called from the VisitorClient when the ClientHandler receives an AskBuildEVent message and firstTime is false.
      Parameters:
      rowWorker - is the row of the box occupied by the worker
      columnWorker - is the column of the box occupied by the worker
      indexWorker - is the integer index of the worker the player wants to move
      isWrongBox - is a boolean that indicates if the move is wrong
      isFirstTime - is a boolean that indicates if this is the first move tried in this turn
      isSpecialTurn - is a boolean used to identify special moves
      clientIndex - is the integer index associated to the client
      currentPlaying - is the integer index of the player who is playing
      done - is a boolean used to indicates if the move turn is over

    • isNotMyTurn

      void isNotMyTurn​(int clientIndex)
      This method is used when is not the player's turn
      Parameters:
      clientIndex - index client

    • loserEvent

      void loserEvent​(int indexClient, java.util.ArrayList<User> userArray, boolean someoneWon)
      This method is used to show to the user who lost the end of the game
      Parameters:
      indexClient - index of the client
      userArray - user array
      someoneWon - true if called by someoneWon method

    • winnerEvent

      void winnerEvent​(int indexClient)
      This method is used to show to the user who win the end of the game
      Parameters:
      indexClient - index of the client

    • someoneWon

      void someoneWon​(int indexClient)
      This method is used to show to the user that an opponent has won
      Parameters:
      indexClient - index of the client

    • whoHasLost

      void whoHasLost​(java.util.ArrayList<User> users, Board board, boolean setReachable, int currentPlaying, int indexClient)
      This method is used to show to the user that an opponent has lost
      Parameters:
      users - is the ArrayList of users taking part to the game
      board - is the object Board describe the game field
      setReachable - is a boolean that indicates if the printed board has to show the reachable boxes
      currentPlaying - is the integer index of the player who is playing
      indexClient - index of the client

    • printHeartBeat

      void printHeartBeat​(ObjHeartBeat objHeartBeat)
      Method used to send, using the SendMessageToServer object, a Pong message to the server after received a ping
      Parameters:
      objHeartBeat - is the message Ping received from the visitorClient

    • closingConnectionEvent

      void closingConnectionEvent​(int indexClient, boolean GameNotAvailable)
      Method used to send to the server the request of closing the connection
      Parameters:
      indexClient - is the index associated to the client
      GameNotAvailable - is a boolean used to indicate if the connection will be close because the game is already started or because of a problem

    • close

      void close()
      Method used to close client when server is not responding
